posts.post_content:
[Venser, The Sojourner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Venser, The Sojourner) can change the target of this naughty little strumpet towards what you need to stop at the time you need to.  
  
And to get your opponent really screwed?. Add a pinch of [Telepathy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Telepathy).

Posted By: Splizer (5/11/2011 11:34:27 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Something I like about this card as opposed to others like it, is the fact that the named card stays in the opponent's deck, they just can't play it. [thought hemorrhage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=thought hemorrhage) removes the card entirely, thus thinning the deck while this one leaves the card giving the opponent a useless draw.  
  
On the other hand, it dies easily to virtually every cheap removal spell.
posts.html:
Something I like about this card as opposed to others like it, is the fact that the named card stays in the opponent's deck, they just can't play it. thought hemorrhage removes the card entirely, thus thinning the deck while this one leaves the card giving the opponent a useless draw.

On the other hand, it dies easily to virtually every cheap removal spell.

posts.post_content: in the current environment, naming volcanic fallout is a huge play. The opponent was hoping on wrecking your early drops easily, then coming in with bombs. you shut them down with meddling mage, drop a baneslayer, and see how they deal with it. usually by conceding.

posts.post_content:
How to Epicly troll someone:
  
   
Turn 1: [Aether vial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aether vial)   
Turn 2: leave mana open, [remand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=remand) what they play next turn
  
Turn 3: play [meddling mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=meddling mage) with the vial for what you remanded, then leave mana open and repeat the process
  
   
   
seriously, remand into meddling mage is an excelent move.
posts.html:
How to Epicly troll someone:

Turn 1: Aether vial
Turn 2: leave mana open, remand what they play next turn
Turn 3: play meddling mage with the vial for what you remanded, then leave mana open and repeat the process


seriously, remand into meddling mage is an excelent move.

posts.post_content:
Totema: In EDH, it depends on how you use it. I've had some decent success naming my opponents' commanders while I've a [Mimic Vat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mimic Vat) in play - it creates a great amount of political fun, as people need to figure out whether or not to risk it coming back naming something more important.  
  
Plus, I pulled a premium one, and it looks gorgeous. :P
posts.html:

Plus, I pulled a premium one, and it looks gorgeous. :P

posts.post_content:
This has won me more games than I can count by working with [Gitaxian Probe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gitaxian Probe) to render 2 (or even 3) copies of a single card useless in one shot. It is so good at ruining a perfectly good hand that it has gotten the nickname "Captain Hatred" in my play group.  
[Vendilion Clique](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vendilion Clique) and [Tidehollow Sculler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tidehollow Sculler) have similar abilities but this has to be my favorite.
posts.html:

Vendilion Clique and Tidehollow Sculler have similar abilities but this has to be my favorite.
